de.bklaiber.inference

Class Inference

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bklaiber.inference.Inference

  • public class Inference
extends java.lang.Object
    Given an unconditioned relational FO-PCL Conditional it returns classes of relational conditioned conditionals and the computed related probability.
    Author:
    klaiber

      • queryConditional

        public java.util.Collection<edu.cs.ai.log4KR.relational.probabilisticConditionalLogic.syntax.RelationalConditional> queryConditional(edu.cs.ai.log4KR.relational.probabilisticConditionalLogic.syntax.RelationalConditional c)
        Computes the probabilities for each ground instance of the query conditional and unifies ground instances with the same probability. for example: c = (flies(X)) against a knowledge base resulting in the computed answers P(flies(Tweety))=0 P(flies(Bully))=0.2 P(flies(Kirby))=0.2 P(flies(Sylvester))=0.2 returns "(flies(X))[0.2]<X!=Tweety>" "(flies(X))[0]<X=Tweety>"
        Parameters:
        c - conditional without probability
        Returns:
        generalized probabilistic conditionals

      • classify

        public java.util.Collection<java.util.Collection<edu.cs.ai.log4KR.relational.probabilisticConditionalLogic.syntax.RelationalConditional>> classify(edu.cs.ai.log4KR.relational.probabilisticConditionalLogic.syntax.RelationalConditional c,
                                                                                                                                                   java.util.Collection<edu.cs.ai.log4KR.relational.probabilisticConditionalLogic.syntax.RelationalConditional> groundInstances)
        Parameters:
        c - conditional without probability
        groundInstances - the ground instances of the conditional
        Returns:
        generalized probabilistic ground instances of the conditional of the query
